name: .AFP File Extension
summary: Learn about .AFP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Data format used for transactional printing purposes; formatted using an object-oriented page description language (PDL) called the Mixed Object Document Content Architecture, also known as the AFP Data Stream (AFPDS).

content: AFP files are recognized by hardware that supports the "Intelligent Printer Data Stream" print protocol. Commonly used by printers in mainframe environments.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
